error.message: Class Drupal\entityconnect\Tests\EntityconnectControllerTest was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Parameter $store of method Drupal\entityconnect\EntityconnectCache::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\user\PrivateTempStoreFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\TempStore\PrivateTempStoreFactory instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to entityconnect.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
